posts.post_content:
Open to offers before I send this card to PSA and then to auction.  I guarantee it to grade numerically.  Only offers of 18k or greater will be considered.

Thanks,
Scott

Please send offers via Email only to:
[url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url]

P.S.  Sorry for the tiny image ... not really sure why that happened - I'd be happy to supply a full sized scan for anyone that is genuinely interested.  There are creases on this card and I would speculate that it would get a '2'.

Scott,

Your image maybe a .jpeg.  If it is and you remove the "e" and make it a .jpg, it will be larger.

Scott any other Uzit's in the lot or just the Cobb?

[url]http://www.csauctions.com/item.cgi?show_item=0000314969[/url]

Cheers,

John

Yes there was one other Uzit.   Good detective work Mr. Wonka as always :)

Best,
S

All good just curious who to see if it's a confirmed example or somebody new. 

Nice lot.

John
Pretty sure it was a confirmed player....but when I have the time I'll sort through the cards n post a reply.
Thanks Scott keep me posted. Congrats. :)

Scott,

A beauty. I knew I should of paid attention to that lot but it got lost in the shuffle. Would love the card but still need a few bucks for Chicago. Hope to see you there.

Adam
